tasks.title: Energy source design and performance implications
tasks.description: Understand the impact of different energy sources on engine performance.

pages.title: Task overview
whatYouLearn: Relationship between aviation and greenhouse gases
The different types of alternative jet fuels
whatYouDo: Compare and select a new energy source for the advanced concept engine program
Generate a comprehensive list of alternative energy sources
Draft a short memo (<300 words) to your lead engineer with your recommendation
